This issue is intended as a place to discuss which upstream model versions we should update to for the new ACCESS-OM3 build. Following instructions from [here](https://access-om3-configs.access-hive.org.au/infrastructure/Building/#new-software-deployments).

## Checklist
 - [ ] added to the OM3 project board.

## Components 
| Component              | CESM | current ACCESS-OM3 | Proposed ACCESS-OM3 |
| ---------------------- | ---- | ------------------ | ------------------- |
| access3                |      |                    |                     |
| access-cice            |      |                    |                     |
| access-mom6            |      |                    |                     |
| access-ww3             |      |                    |                     |
| access3-share          |      |                    |                     |
| CDEPS                  |      |                    |                     |
| CMEPS                  |      |                    |                     |
| CESM_share             |      |                    |                     |
| access-generic-tracers |      |                    |                     |
| access-mocsy           |      |                    |                     |
